content.body: Dominic Farolino: shadow tree integration with the wider web platform was never really fully finished and I doubt we actually have tests covering all these scenarios, so that seems plausible unfortunately
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: shadow tree integration with the wider web platform was never really fully finished and I doubt we actually have tests covering all these scenarios, so that seems plausible unfortunately

content.body: Dominic Farolino: in particular when you see something say "in a document" it hasn't been looked at yet, but a lot of these things could do with more review and tests: https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#document-trees
